form_player_caution_detail.en: â€Name constraint details ãƒ» You can use alphanumeric characters, Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji, and some symbols that can be expressed in Shift-JIS. ãƒ» Numbers and underscores cannot be used for the first character ãƒ» Names with 13 characters or more cannot be used ãƒ» Names such as â€anonymousâ€ cannot be used. ãƒ» Please do not use characters and proper nouns that appear in games, manga, novels, etc. ãƒ» You cannot use a name that someone else is already using. ãƒ» Some symbols cannot be used (! â€â€ $ &'() ï¿¥ /) ãƒ» Machine-dependent characters (kanji, pictograms, circled numbers, etc. other than common kanji) cannot be used. ãƒ» You cannot use the real names of yourself, acquaintances, real people, or celebrities on the Internet. â€

form_conf_post_other_post_caution.en: â€Please read before posting Please read the rules carefully before sending. This is a contact form that requires proof of user. The Google form is sure to provide information that can be done anonymously (defect reports, requests, vandalism reports, etc.). If you want a reply due to a request, please enter your email address or Twitter ID (half-width alphanumeric characters including @) in the first line. In the case of Twitter, it will be DM from the administrator Twitter. It may not be delivered depending on the settings and follow-up status. If you want to apply for user deletion due to unavoidable circumstances, please enter â€Deleteâ€ in the form below and send it as it is. We will take measures to change the user name to â€anonymousâ€ (Please note that the score itself is strongly related to the rank points of other participants and cannot be deleted). â€

form_score_evidence_photo_detail.en: â€Details of proof photo conditions -Images larger than 3MB are automatically compressed. ãƒ» Normal ranking 10th or higher (20th or higher in Pikmin 2), required for posting to special rankings. ãƒ» It is desirable to have a result screen that shows most of the result screen, preferably with confetti. ãƒ» If you fail to take a picture, you can use a picture of the screen where the high score of the stage is displayed on the stage select screen. ãƒ» It doesn't matter if it's a direct shot or a cap image, but if you take a direct shot, be careful about reflections such as faces and Exif information (photos will be published on the site) â€

form_score_evidence_attachment_video_det.ja: ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆå‹•ç”»ã®æ¡ä»¶è©³ç´° ãƒ»ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆå‹•ç”»ã¯ç¾åœ¨ä¸å…·åˆå¯¾å¿œä¸­ã§ã™ã€‚ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ï¼ˆ2020/07/04ï¼‰ ãƒ»ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆå‹•ç”»ã¯å½“ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã¸ç›´æ¥å‹•ç”»ã‚’ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹ä»•çµ„ã¿ã§ã™ã€‚ ãƒ»ãƒ”ã‚¯ãƒŸãƒ³2é€šå¸¸ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°10ä½ä»¥ä¸Šã¾ãŸã¯å„ç¨®RTAã§ã¯åŸå‰‡å¿…é ˆï¼ˆå‹•ç”»ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã§ã‚‚å¯ï¼‰ ãƒ»é©å½“ãªéŸ³è³ªã®éŸ³å£°ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã®èªè­˜ã«æ”¯éšœãŒãªã„ç”»è³ªã§ã‚ã‚Šã€è‘—ã—ã„ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã‚„éŸ³ã‚ºãƒ¬ãŒãªã„ã“ã¨ ãƒ»Aviutl + x264GUIã§ã®H.264ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ¨å¥¨ã€‚ãƒ“ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆæŒ‡å®šã¯éŸ³å£°æœ€å¤§128kbpsã€ä¸Šé™ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºæŒ‡å®šæœ€å¤§40MB ãƒ»æ©Ÿç¨®ã«ã‹ã‹ã‚ã‚‰ãšãƒ”ã‚¯ãƒŸãƒ³1/2ã§ã¯480pãƒ»30fpsã€ãƒ”ã‚¯ãƒŸãƒ³3ã§ã¯720pï½1080pãƒ»60fpsæ¨å¥¨ã€‚ ãƒ»ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤æ™‚é–“ãŒé•·ã„å ´åˆãªã©ã§ä¸Šè¨˜è¨­å®šã§ç”»è³ªã«é›£ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯YouTubeã¸ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã‚’ã”æ¤œè¨ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
form_score_evidence_attachment_video_det.en: â€Details of short video conditions ãƒ» Short videos are currently being fixed. I can't upload. (2020/07/04) ãƒ» Short videos are a mechanism for uploading videos directly to this site. ãƒ» Pikmin 2 is usually ranked 10th or higher or required in principle for various RTAs (video sites are also acceptable) -There is sound with appropriate sound quality, the image quality does not interfere with the recognition of game play, and there is no significant block noise or sound deviation. -H.264 encoding with Aviutl + x264 GUI is recommended. Bit rate specification is maximum audio 128kbps, maximum file size specification maximum 40MB ãƒ» Regardless of the model, 480p / 30fps is recommended for Pikmin 1/2, and 720p-1080p / 60fps is recommended for Pikmin 3. ãƒ» If you have difficulty in image quality with the above settings due to long play time, please consider posting to YouTube. â€

array_stage_summary9.en: This ranking is based on normal total point that generated according to all normal ranking(Pikmin 1

array_stage_summary10.en: This ranking is based on â€Pikmin 1â€ total point that generated according to 5 rankings in Pikmin 1. You need to progress Main Story to play Challenge mode.

array_stage_summary20.en: In this ranking, NGC â€œPikmin 2â€, Wii â€œWii Play Pikmin 2â€, Wii U â€œWii Play Pikmin 2 (DL version)â€ will compete in the total points of all 30 stages of 1P challenge mode. You will be able to play Challenge Mode when you get â€œthat keyâ€ in the main story.

array_stage_summary21.en: In this ranking, in the â€œPikmin 2â€ 1P challenge mode, you will compete with the total points of 13 stages where eggs appear. Eggs may not appear on some stages depending on the placement. When you break an egg, 10 â€œMititesâ€ will appear at 1/20, and 10 bonus points will be added for each egg you carry.

array_stage_summary22.en: In this ranking, in the â€œPikmin 2â€ 1P challenge mode, you will compete with the total points of 17 stages where eggs do not appear.

array_stage_summary30.en: In this ranking, we will compete with the total points of all 50 stages of Wii U â€œPikmin 3â€ and Nintendo Switch â€œPikmin 3 Deluxeâ€ mission modes (time attack systems such as â€œDefeat Bosses!â€ Are counted as 1 point per second remaining time. Will be). Some stages cannot be played without purchasing paid DLC. Evidence photos are required for 3rd place and above, and evidence videos are optional in any order. Please read the rules and welcome to the picturele competition before posting for the first time.

array_stage_summary31.en: In this ranking, in the â€œPikmin 3â€ 1P mission mode, you will compete with the total points of 15 stages in the â€œCollect treasure!â€ Category. The time bonus is 30 points per second. Some stages are paid additional content.

array_stage_summary32.en: In this ranking, in the â€œPikmin 3â€ 1P mission mode, you will compete with the total points of 15 stages in the â€œBattle Enemies!â€ Category. The time bonus is 30 points per second from â€œBE01 Tropical Forestâ€ to â€œBE05 Shaded Gardenâ€, and 10 points per second thereafter. Some stages are paid additional content.

array_stage_summary33.en: In this ranking, Wii U â€œPikmin 3â€ mission mode â€œDefeat Bosses!â€ Compete with the total points of all 6 stages. The score is counted as 1 point for each second of remaining time. The stage will be unlocked when you defeat the giant creatures in each stage of the main story.

array_stage_summary23.en: The main story underground challenge is a section RTA where you can play with the underground 1 stage of the main story of â€Pikmin 2â€ as the challenge mode. Participation requires a recording environment and some means of time measurement. In addition

array_stage_summary26.en: The new challenge mode is a special ranking based on our unique rules

array_stage_summary28.en: The new challenge mode is a special ranking based on our unique rules

array_stage_summary34.en: In this ranking, we will compete for the total score of â€œPikmin 3â€ 2P mission mode. In the target stage, all scores given by playing with other than the appropriate number of people (double play by one person, etc.) will be invalid.

array_stage_summary35.en: In this ranking, we will compete for the overall results of â€œPikmin 3â€ bingo battle mode. The score is the sum of the rate values in the â€œRegular Leagueâ€ (no macaroons, 1 to 1 leader, 25 Pikmin battles) in all target stages. The rate values are stored internally in single precision floating point numbers (14 digits) and may not match the apparent total rate displayed on each stage.

array_stage_summary36.en: In this ranking, we will compete for the total score of 14 stages of â€œPikmin 3 Deluxeâ€ side story mode.

array_stage_summary91.en: The limited-time ranking is a ranking unique to this site that competes for the total score with special rules that can be posted only within a fixed period. Advance notice will be made on the administrator Twitter and this site. If the â€Pikminâ€ challenge mode is the target

array_stage_summary92.en: The daily challenge is a unique ranking where you can play with the binding rules of â€Pikmin 2â€ challenge mode

array_stage_summary93.en: In this ranking, we will compete with the total rank points of all stages of the main RTA.

array_stage_summary94.en: In this ranking, you will compete with the total rank points of all stages of the Challenge Complex.

array_stage_summary95.en: This ranking is the latest rating of all 22 stages of â€Pikmin 2â€ 2P bingo battle mode and â€Pikmin 3â€ bingo battle mode. Rating calculation is unique to this site. The initial value is 1500. All the games played according to the standard rules are counted

array_stage_summary98.en: Users who have never posted since September 01, 2015 are not included in the total. If you post even once, the total number including the one before August 31, 2015 will be reflected.

array_stage_summary203.en: For records that you played in non-Japanese version, add 200 points and register.

array_stage_summary213.en: For records that you played in non-Japanese version, deduct 100 points and register.

array_stage_summary228.en: For records that you played in non-Japanese version, deduct 40 points and register.
